thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 28 of 7354
thread.title: Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text:
Every time I interact with B&H reps, whether by phone or live chat, and I have technical questions to help select the right product, they know their stuff, or they find someone that does. And sometimes they may give you advice you don't want to hear, but even then, they are usually right. So at the least, be sure to listen to what they have to say.
PS Their expedited free shipping (when your order is over a certain amount) is pretty fast. I usually get it in three business days, sometimes two, from NY to TX. They have not failed me yet after many orders.
